name: Super Magical Anime Sisters
description:
NOTE: Run game in Fullscreen as some of the UI is cutoff in Minimised

Super Magical Anime Sisters is a 1v1 Brawler kindof like Super Smash Bros. Battle your friend to become the champion of the arena. It was made for MiniJam 22 and Alakajam #5. Use your Magical Fireballs to take out your opponent and win.

Controls:
Player 1:
A & D: Movement
W: Jump
E: Fire

Player 2: 
J & L: Movement
I: Jump
O: Fire
